item.title: OSCAL Release Notes
item.description: Detailed release notes are provided with each OSCAL release. The following are extra release notes for some older OSCAL releases. OSCAL 1.0.0 Release The following changes were made in OSCAL 1.0.0 since OSCAL 1.0.0 Release Candidate (RC) 2. Overall changes The following general changes were made in this release. In prior releases for some JSON objects, an object's identifier was used as a property. For example: { "identifer1": { "comment": "remainder of object 1" }, "identifer2": { "comment": "remainder of object 2" } } While this "BY_KEY" notation does enforce uniqueness of identifiers, this syntax is difficult to write parsers for.
